name: Scylla
description: The barbaric gesture doesn't match its elegant appearance.

set.set_2: Equipping this matrix on the current weapon increases crit damage by **13%**/**16%**/**19%**/**23%** and shatter by **13%**/**16%**/**19%**/**23%**.
set.set_4: Equipping **2** or more weapons of different elements or types increases all elemental damage by **10%**/**12%**/**14%**/**16%**. The effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
